SEARCH
Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.view

Class IngredientViewBuilder

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.view.IngredientViewBuilder
public class IngredientViewBuilder extends Object
This class is responsible for creating user interface components related to ingredient management in a JavaFX application. It provides methods to build and return graphical components for displaying and editing ingredients.

  • Constructor Details

    • IngredientViewBuilder

      public IngredientViewBuilder()
      Constructor for IngredientViewBuilder.

  • Method Details

    • getIngredientsGroup

      public javafx.scene.Group getIngredientsGroup()
      Creates and returns a Group containing a VBox as its root element. This container is used to group elements in the ingredient view but is initially empty.
      Returns:
      a Group object containing an empty VBox with ID set to "ingredient-container".

    • getIngredientVbox

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getIngredientVbox(String name, float defaultAmount, String unit)
      Creates a VBox containing the UI components for managing a single ingredient. This includes elements for displaying the ingredient's name, adjusting its amount, and editing or removing the ingredient.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient.
      defaultAmount - The default amount of the ingredient.
      unit - The unit of measure for the ingredient (e.g., grams, liters).
      Returns:
      a VBox containing the UI elements for ingredient management.

    • getIngredientEditPane

      public javafx.scene.Group getIngredientEditPane(String name, String unit, float defaultAmount)
      Builds and returns a Group containing a pane for editing an ingredient's properties. This pane allows modification of the ingredient's name, unit, and default amount, and includes a save button.
      Parameters:
      name - The initial name of the ingredient to display in the edit pane.
      unit - The initial unit of the ingredient to display in the edit pane.
      defaultAmount - The initial default amount of the ingredient to display in the edit pane.
      Returns:
      a Group containing a VBox configured for editing an ingredient's details.
